ModMetaData.name: Thunder Bucket
ModMetaData.author: bblkepling
ModMetaData.description: Patches the toilet's labels and descriptions to say thunder bucket, and adds a simple thunder bucket(It's a latrine without a sewage connection and uses the water bucket texture). Made in honor of Kevin Murphy who always makes me crack up when he says "thunder bucket," and because my pawns always end up living in a cave doing their buisness in a bucket.
